availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carlisle based lawyer. Married Anna Francis Price. Father to John A. Quisenberry and Robert Taylor Quisenberry.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860); Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870); U.S., Find a Grave Index, 1600s-Current, “Thomas Edwin Quisenberry (1826-1871)” https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GSln=quisenberry&GSfn=thomas&GSby=1840&GSbyrel=before&GSdyrel=all&GSob=n&GRid=41856130&df=all& (Accessed February 11, 2017)
